newsitem.title: ESTONIA: SLOW TRADE SEES SHARES DRIFTING AND TALSE DOWN.
newsitem.headline: SLOW TRADE SEES SHARES DRIFTING AND TALSE DOWN.

text.p: * Morning trade was 8.9 million kroons on Tuesday morning on
* The Talse on-line index was down 0.51 percent to 274.82.
* Hansapank was the most active stock with 2.3 million
kroons traded to be stable at 146.55/147.10 vs 147.00 kroons.
traded on a spread of 53.55/53.95 vs 53.65 kroons.
* Dealers said early morning trade was slow with some
buying interest in banking stocks, but trade is expected to
remain quiet and prices generally stable to lower.
(See index on stock exchange web site:
